pullrequest.title: Enable word wrap for globals value column

content.raw:
Awesome! I had wondered about the tableview but figured that was a big enough change I shouldn’t mess with it.

Anyway, sorry to pass the nerd-snipe on. On the surface it seemed like it would be so easy but it ended up being a lot more involved.
